Package model

Class ShowTime

java.lang.Object
model.ShowTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ItemTag, ShowTimeBooking
public class ShowTime extends Object implements Serializable, ItemTag, ShowTimeBooking
This class contains all the information of a showtime
